description.main: web technologies, creative design, and security expertise

paragraphs: I am a BCA student at Jagran Lakecity University with strong skills in web development, logo design, and a growing interest in ethical hacking and cybersecurity. I have hands-on experience building responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL.

I've worked on diverse projects including a face recognition attendance system, AI-based chatbot applications, e-commerce websites with smart features, and WhatsApp-based automation systems. I also create creative and professional logo designs for individuals and small businesses.

I am passionate about learning new technologies, solving real-world problems through code, and delivering clean, efficient, and user-friendly digital solutions. Currently open to freelance opportunities, mini projects, and collaborations where I can apply my technical and creative skills to add real value.
